title: ArmorStats
description: Accompanying bonus stats to an Armor instance

charisma.description: A number value that modifies how charming or attractive the wearer is

constitution.description: A number value that modifies how much stamina or endurance the wearer has

defense.description: A number value that modifies the wearer's protection

dexterity.description: A number value that modifies how nimble the wearer is

intelligence.desription: A number value that modifies how book smart the wearer is

luck.desription: A number value that modifies how lucky the wearer is

perception.desription: A number value that modifies how aware of surroundings the wearer is

strength.desription: A number value that modifies how physically powerful the wearer is

wisdom.desription: A number value that modifies how street smart the wearer is

armor.desription: A number value that modifies how resilient the wearer is

created.description: The The ISO 8601 formatted date that this armor instances was created

updated.description: The The ISO 8601 formatted date that this armor instances was last updated
